thread.section_title: Rome Life Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel
thread.title_full: Great Hotel - Review of Rome Life Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: grantp60
title: Great Hotel
text:
My wife and I just returned from a stay at the Roman Life Hotel; we were there for a week. We couldn't have been more pleased. The place, itself, was clean, comfortable and well-appointed. The people who worked there were happy, friendly and more than helpful.
The breakfast, included in our stay was excellent. There were a couple of times during our week, that we had to leave the hotel before breakfast was served at 7AM. We notified the desk this would be the case, and there was a box breakfast waiting for us as we left, When we return to Rome, we sill stay in this hotel again!
Lastly, the location of this hotel is prefect. It is located in a pleasant neighborhood, on the Via de Palermo, 15 minutes walk from the Coliseum and a 10 minutes walk from Rome's Termini Station.
